name: AIOMetadata
description: Ultimate Stremio metadata addon aggregating movies, series, and anime metadata from multiple sources (TMDB, TVDB, MAL, AniList, IMDb, TVmaze, Fanart.tv, MDBList).
author: JigSawFr

form_fields.label: TMDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Required: Your TMDB API key (get it from https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api)

form_fields.label: TVDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your TVDB API key for additional metadata

form_fields.label: Fanart.tv API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your Fanart.tv API key for enhanced artwork

form_fields.label: MDBList API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your MDBList API key for personal lists and catalogs

form_fields.label: RPDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your RPDB API key for rating posters

form_fields.label: Admin Key
form_fields.hint: Secure admin key for dashboard and cache management

form_fields.label: Addon Password
form_fields.hint: Optional: Password to protect your addon configuration

form_fields.label: Gemini API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Google Gemini API key for AI-powered search

form_fields.label: AniList Client ID
form_fields.hint: Optional: AniList OAuth client ID (from https://anilist.co/settings/developer)

form_fields.label: AniList Redirect URI
form_fields.hint: Optional: AniList OAuth redirect URI (e.g., https://yourdomain.com/anilist/callback)

form_fields.label: Trakt Client ID
form_fields.hint: Optional: Trakt OAuth client ID (from https://trakt.tv/oauth/applications)

form_fields.label: SOCKS Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: Optional: SOCKS proxy for all requests (e.g., socks5://user:pass@host:port)

form_fields.label: Cache Warm Interval (hours)
form_fields.hint: How often to refresh popular content cache (default: 24, minimum: 12)

form_fields.label: Cache Warm Language
form_fields.hint: Language for cache warming (e.g., en-US, fr-FR)

form_fields.label: Disable Metrics
form_fields.hint: Disable telemetry metrics collection (request tracking, cache stats). Recommended for privacy.
